title: HoP 240 - Animal, Vegetable, Mineral - Albert the Great’s Natural Philosophy
itunes:title: HoP 240 - Animal, Vegetable, Mineral - Albert the Great’s Natural Philosophy
description: Albert the Great earns his nickname “universal doctor” by devoting himself to the whole of nature, from geology and botany to the study of human nature.
